title: Fantasy Background Music
description: 2-hour COMPILATION of several of my fantasy background exploration music albums and tracks. 33 professionally mastered tracks.
longDescription:
FANTASY Background Music

by Wiktoria Zac


LISTEN NOW


This music pack is a COMPILATION of several of my fantasy background exploration music albums and tracks. It contains, MISTWOOD music album, Catharsis music album, Exploration tracks from Fantasy Music Collection, and two brand new tracks.

Designed for Fantasy Worlds, RPGs, and everything in between! Perfect for promotional purposes. The tracks have been created using the best quality tools and techniques.


The pack includes:

➼ 33 Professionally mastered original tracks

➼ 20 of them are in TWO VARIATIONS (with tail and loops)

➼ Minutes of audio provided: full 2hrs 6min 58sec | seamless loops 1hr 11min 11sec

technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Wavs: 53

Number of Audio Cues: 53

Sample rate/bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 1411kbps, 24 bits, Stereo WAVs

Does music loop: 20 of 33 tracks are loopable

Minutes of audio provided: full 2hrs 6min 58sec | seamless loops 1hr 11min 11sec

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
